title: Intro Philosophy
description: An introduction to the nature of philosophy through the critical analysis of selected works, such as Descartes, Hobbes, and Locke.  The relationship of philosophy to science, religion, and culture will be emphasized.  Credit not allowed for both PST 1101 and PHIL 2010
